(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

#### Import changes for modified files

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ ball`
`+ isClosed_ball`
`+ isOpen_ball`
`+ mem_ball_self`
`- UniformSpace.ball`
`- UniformSpace.isClosed_ball`
`- UniformSpace.isOpen_ball`
`- UniformSpace.mem_ball_self`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by grunweg.
Also, could you please add deprecated aliases?
Actually I don't think I should add deprecated aliases as they would conflict with the namespaced lemmas, forbidding everyone to `open UniformSpace`
This PR was included in a batch that was canceled, it will be automatically retried

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10646016227/job/29512392946)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10646016227/job/29512392860)

`ball` is used in many contexts, and this one clashes with `Metric.ball` --- seems reasonable to namespaces it.
maintainer merge

`ball` is used in many contexts, and this one clashes with `Metric.ball` --- seems reasonable to namespaces it.
maintainer merge
Flagging to other reviewers: this is necessary as there is also `UniformSpace.comap_comap`, which comes in scope with the `open UniformSpace` above.
Would it be easier to not open this NS? Or open it hiding `comap_comap`? If you open it, then you can drop `UniformSpace.` here and there.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: Namespace `UniformSpace.ball` API
